--- layout: component title: Table description: In its most basic definition a table is an ordered listing of data in which each of the properties for an individual record (row) are given their own segment (column). This is especially useful for comparing large sets of data across records or segments. guidelines: do: - Compare data sets or specific values across data records - Display all properties or attributes of a data set as well as their explicit values - Provide an exhaustive listing of all data - View and edit a complete or semi-complete set of objects/entities - Limit tables to 20 rows before pagination dont: - Use for viewing relational data across data sets - Guide the user to a specific conclusion with data contents: - Usage guidelines - Basic table - Empty table - Sortable columns - Hover rows - Row status - Icon status - Responsive table - Mobile layout ---
